content.rendered:
The secret of success lies in the opportunities you undertake and appreciation you receive by the one you love. Similarly, the beginning of New Year has been raunchiest for Digiperform by the love and admiration received from the Media as well as our followers. Digiperform has been in news during the full month of Jan 2018 and sparkled in many newspapers/publications. Here, we give the glimpse of all the happenings where Digiperform has appeared in the prominent newspapers and magazines.
  • Business World
The online edition of one of the prominent business magazines – Business World – has featured the Digiperform’s article highlighting the Digital Marketing Trends that will rule in the year 2018 on 8th Jan’18 with the headline – “5 Digital Marketing Trends to Watch Out for in 2018”.
  • The Tribune
The print and online version of the publication – The Tribune has featured the article on behalf of Digiperform in the weekly HR and career supplement of the publication – Jobs & Career on 17th Jan’18 with the headline – “Successful Career in Digital Marketing“.
  • Entrepreneur India
The online edition of one of the prominent business magazines – Entrepreneur India has featured the article on behalf of Digiperform highlighting the latest digital marketing trends that will rule in the year 2018 on 17th Jan’18 under the headline – “5 Digital Marketing Trends to Watch Out for in 2018″.
  • The Week

Digiperform has featured in the prominent business magazine – The Week, sharing a quote on the industry story under the headline, “Budget Wishlist: Startups expect more reforms around GST, digitization push” about startups employees and work culture at startups in its online edition on 20th January 2018.

The story highlights what are the expectations of entrepreneurs from the upcoming Union Budget-2018 and has featured among industry players like Mitesh Shah – BookMyShow, Priya Krishnan – Founding Years Learning Solutions, and Aditya Loomba – Eco Rent a Car.

  • Entrepreneur India

Digiperform has featured in the prominent online magazine – Entrepreneur India, sharing a quote on the industry story under the headline, “How Brands Can Handle Social Media Goof Up?” about what action plans the company should keep in place to handle social media crisis situation, published on January 24, 2018.

The story highlights the ways for brands to handle social media goof up and has featured among industry players like iCubesWire , nexGTv, and Social Frontier.

  • The Pioneer
The print and online version of the publication – The Pioneer has featured the byline article on behalf of Digiperform “5 Digital Marketing Trends to watch out for in 2018”  under the headline section ‘2018: Digital Trends to watch out for’ in the weekly career & education supplement of the publication called ‘Avenues’ dedicated to education,career and HR sector on January 24th, 2018.
  • Zee Business

Digiperform has featured in the prominent business news platform – Zee Business, sharing a quote on the industry story under the headline, “Startups look for a booster dose in Union Budget?” in its online edition published on January 24, 2018.

The story highlights what are the expectations of entrepreneurs from the upcoming Union Budget-2018 and has featured among industry players like Dinesh Agarwal, IndiaMART.com etc.

  • INC 42

Digiperform has appeared in the prominent online platform – Inc 42, sharing a quote on the industry story under the headline, “Union Budget 2018: Here’s a look at what Ed-Tech Startups want from Jaitley This Year” published on January 30, 2018.

The story highlights how Ed-Tech Startups have revolutionized the way people learn and what are the expectations of entrepreneurs from the upcoming Union Budget-2018 and has featured among industry players like Udacity,  Imarticus Learning etc.

  • Business Standard
The online version of the publications – Business Standard has featured the press release on “Digiperform gives a robust push to the PM Modi’s Digital India vision, trained over 10,000 digital marketers in the country since inception” on 27th Dec’17.
  • Outlook India
The online version of the publications – Outlook India has featured the press release on “Digiperform gives a robust push to the PM Modi’s Digital India vision, trained over 10,000 digital marketers in the country since inception” on 27th Dec’17.
  • ANI News
The online version of the publications – ANI News has featured the press release on “Digiperform gives a robust push to the PM Modi’s Digital India vision, trained over 10,000 digital marketers in the country since inception” on 27th Dec’17.
  • Sify
The online version of the publications – Sify has featured the press release on “Digiperform gives a robust push to the PM Modi’s Digital India vision, trained over 10,000 digital marketers in the country since inception” on 27th Dec’17.

Keep Reading for more News!
